wikipedia_page.main:
Matthew Smith (born 10 November 1977) was an English cricketer. He was a right-handed batsman and a left-arm off-break bowler who played for Hertfordshire. He was born in Harrow.
Smith, who made his Minor Counties Championship debut for the team during the 2008 season, made two List A appearances in the C&G Trophy in 2001. He scored 5 runs and took figures of 3-43 on his debut, and in his second match scored 18 runs, taking figures of 0-35.

link_mentions.page: List of Hertfordshire County Cricket Club List A players
